thread.title: BRIEF-WEX Inc Reports Q4 GAAP EPS Of $1.85

title: BRIEF-WEX Inc Reports Q4 GAAP EPS Of $1.85
text: February 21, 2018 / 11:35 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-WEX Inc Reports Q4 GAAP EPS Of $1.85 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Wex Inc: * REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.49 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.85 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 14 PERCENT TO $331.3 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.4 BILLION TO $1.44 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $333 MILLION TO $343 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ‍ADJUSTED NET INCOME IN RANGE OF $1.66 TO $1.74 PER DILUTED SHARE​ * SEES 2018 ‍ADJUSTED NET INCOME IN RANGE OF $7.30 TO $7.70 PER DILUTED SHARE​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.46, REVENUE VIEW $326.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.59, REVENUE VIEW $334.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $7.08, REVENUE VIEW $1.41 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
